scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.clean: (if exist node_modules rmdir node_modules /q /s) && (if exist dist rmdir dist /q /s) && (if exist package-lock.json del -f -q package-lock.json) && (if exist test_out rmdir test_out /q /s)
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run start -- -v build --pattern="/test/**/*.ts" --root-dir="." --out-dir="./test_out" && jest .test.js --coverage --coverageReporters=text
scripts.test-coveralls: npm run build && npm run start -- -v build --pattern="/test/**/*.ts" --root-dir="." --out-dir="./test_out" --source-map --inline-source-map && jest .test.js --coverage --coverageReporters=text-lcov | coveralls
